citation_details.title: Analyzing neural response to visual stimuli: Firing rates, frequency band dynamics, and synchrony in near and far flanker conditions
citation_details.author: M Kunwar, N Dhital, N Bhusal
citation_details.abstract: This study examines neural responses to visual stimuli under Near and Far flanker conditions  using EEG. Fifty participants (25 per condition) completed a visual task with closely or
citation_details.short_author: M Kunwar, N Dhital, N Bhusal
